profile: 2012 and 2013 Consumer Choice Award winner for Chimney Services. A-1 Quality Chimney is an award-winning, full-service chimney company that has been serving homeowners in Toronto and surrounding areas for 30 years. Chimney cleaning, masonry repair and general maintenance is essential to preventing fire and ensuring safe operation of wood, oil, coal and gas burning appliances. With over 60,000 customers, we service thousands of fireplaces, wood stoves, pizza ovens, gas fireplaces, furnaces and other heating appliances. When it comes to chimney repairs and chimney rebuilds, we are able to address any masonry issues that arise. Above the roof line, chimneys bear the brunt of our cold winters and hot summers and diagnosing and addressing masonry issues is our specialty. Once you are ready for your repairs, weâ€™ll get it done, on-time and on-budget. Having been in the business for so long, most of our customers come back to us year after year. And so we strive to give you the best service we can and ensure you and your family are safe and warm.
